highlights: Support CI/CD pipelines, including Jenkins scripts, Terragrunt config, ArgoCD deployments, Helm Charts and Kustomize manifests
Maintain and create Terraform modules to automate workflows and reduce manual, error-prone toil
Create Grafana dashboards and alerts using infrastructure as code (Prometheus + Grafana + Cortex, Python)
Contribute features and bug fixes to our internal TUI/CLI tool written in Go
Maintain and support Azure infrastructure, including AKS, Linux and Windows VMs, and related services
Work with our internal FinOps team to reduce cloud operating costs by modifying Terraform modules
Supported and maintained production and pre-production kubernetes clusters using various tools, including kops, Terraform, helm, k9s
Maintained Terraform modules, Helm charts, Ruby scripts and supporting CI/CD infrastructure (custom GitHub actions, ArgoCD, Vault, Terragrunt)
Collaborate with engineering team to deploy new k8s features to improve service uptime and security
Continuously improve monitoring and alerting to ensure platform availability and uptime (Grafana + Prometheus + TICK stack)
Led incident response and root cause analysis (RCA) for production incidents, and devised action plan
Assisted with hiring by conducting interviews for SRE roles
Assisted customers with end-to-end deployment of CloudBees CI to Kubernetes (AWS EKS, GKS, Azure, self-hosted) via live screen-sharing sessions (and email)
Supported customers during critical system outages by providing accurate, timely problem diagnoses and clear resolution steps
Managed a backlog of customer support requests ranging from complex technical issues to recommending CI/CD best practices
Reported bugs and collaborate with engineering to test and deliver fixes
Contributed to customer-facing knowledge base and improved product documentation
Replaced ad-hoc bash scripts with Terraform for provisioning libvirt-based virtual machines on system Z
Converted Chef recipes to Ansible playbooks
Performed root-cause analysis on various network, storage, and virtualization related-bugs using Linux shell utilities (tcpdump, ptrace, etc)
Collaborated with IBM KVM development team to plan and prioritize upcoming test cycle
Led education sessions to onboard teammates to modern infrastructure-as-code tools such as Ansible, Terraform, and Docker
Developed and supported two z/OS system APIs: an HTTP client library (C code), and a backend API for automating system Z hardware configuration (various languages)
As iteration manager, facilitated daily stand-ups, user story sessions, design discussions, and retrospectives
Developed a CLI application in C to generate and run tests against HTTP/JSON client library
Led migration from manual build process to automated CI pipeline (RTCBuild with Jenkins) resulting in improved code quality and a streamlined developer experience
